description: Smallest starting index for a run of at least n consecutive equal digits in decimal expansion of Pi.
links: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Pi Digits.
crossrefs: Compare A049523: the first run of six 9's occurs (with starting index 763) before any runs of exactly four or exactly five equal digits.
Cf. A084145 (digit with this starting index).
author: _Harvey P. Dale_
extensions: More terms from _Rick L. Shepherd_, May 22 2003
